content: It depends on the level of detail and completeness of the design that you want to achieve. At this point, we have established a set of requirements and specifications for Pig, as well as some initial design parameters such as its size, weight, payload, and rotor configuration. However, there may still be many more details to be addressed in order to fully flesh out the design, such as the selection of specific components and materials, the optimization of aerodynamics and propulsion systems, and the development of control and navigation algorithms.
